channel.title: Pages on Matt Daines
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Matt Daines

item.title: About
item.description: Early Life I was always curious about technology while growing up. I was fortunate enough that from a young age I had access to a PC and the screeching sound of dial-up. I’m just barely old enough to remember it! I played a decent amount of video games as a kid, though I don’t really remember the names of the games. As I grew older I started learning Excel formulas, mostly using the If function and conditional formatting.
